argument.name: directory_name
argument.description: The fully qualified name (which should include the full path and an optional drive specification) of the directory to delete. Before it can be removed, a directory must be empty and cannot contain any sub-directories. Character

section.description: DIR_REMOVE() removes the directory specified by Directory_Name. Use DIR_REMOVE_RECURSE()if you uncertain if the directory exists.

section.title: Example
section.description: This statement erases the temporary table ASCII file and then removes the TEMP sub-directory from the A5 directory.
